rules_text:
Flash, Hexproof
When Guernica Vandham enters the battlefield, choose any number of attacking creatures, put a stun counter on each of them.
When Guernica Vandham dies, if you are stagnant, you may cast target noncreature spell from your graveyard until you aren't stagnant. [i](You are stagnant if you didn't attack a player during your last turn.)[/i]
